mapper.select: SELECT photo, pid, DATE_FORMAT(birthday, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthday, uuid, DATE_FORMAT(hiredate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS hiredate, email, remark, tag, address, description FROM doctor WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doctor( name, pid, uuid, sex, birthday, school, degree, tel, address, email, job, remark, description, hiredate, tag, recommended, status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{pid}, #{uuid}, #{sex}, STR_TO_DATE(#{birthday}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{school}, #{degree}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{email}, #{job}, #{remark}, #{description}, STR_TO_DATE(#{hiredate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{tag}, #{recommended}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT d.id AS id, d.name AS name, d.pid AS pid, d.uuid AS uuid, d.sex AS sex, DATE_FORMAT(d.birthday, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthday, d.school AS school, d.degree AS degree, d.tel AS tel, d.address AS address, d.email AS email, d.job AS job, d.remark AS remark, d.description AS description, DATE_FORMAT(d.hiredate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS hiredate, d.tag AS tag, d.recommended AS recommended, d.status AS status, md.name AS deptName, sd.dept_sub_id AS deptSubId FROM doctor d JOIN medical_dept_sub_and_doctor sd ON sd.doctor_id = d.id JOIN medical_dept_sub s ON sd.dept_sub_id = s.id JOIN medical_dept md ON s.dept_id = md.id WHERE d.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE doctor SET name = #{name}, pid = #{pid}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = STR_TO_DATE(#{birthday}, '%Y-%m-%d'), school = #{school}, degree = #{degree}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, email = #{email}, job = #{job}, remark = #{remark}, description = #{description}, hiredate = STR_TO_DATE(#{hiredate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), tag = #{tag}, recommended = #{recommended}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT d.id AS doctorId, d.uuid AS uuid, d.name AS name, d.photo AS photo, d.job AS job, d.description AS description, d.remark AS remark, md.id AS deptId, md.name AS deptName, ds.id AS subId, ds.name AS subName, FORMAT(dp.price_2, 2) AS price FROM doctor d JOIN medical_dept_sub_and_doctor sd ON sd.doctor_id = d.id JOIN medical_dept_sub ds ON sd.dept_sub_id = ds.id JOIN medical_dept md ON md.id = ds.dept_id JOIN doctor_price dp ON dp.doctor_id = d.id WHERE d.id = #{doctorId}
